awd_titl_txt: ROW:  Magnetic Measurements in Amorphous Rare Earth Alloys
awd_abstract_narration: New expertise and capabilities in the area of magnetic measurements             will be developed to compliment the existing Mossbauer program in               amorphous rare earth alloys at Franklin and Marshall College.                   Magnetic measurements will be made in collaboration with scientists             in the Superconductor and Magnetic Measurements Group at the                    National Institute of Standards and Technology, Boulder, Colorado.              It is proposed to add other magnetic measurement capabilities to                the existing laboratory at Franklin and Marshall, which will                    enhance the PI's skill in the area of magnetism, introduce                      undergraduates to new experimental techniques, and aid in her                   career development.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
